name: Example Analysis
description: Example template showing how to structure analysis instructions
prompt_template:
Analyze this document and provide:

1. Section One Title:
   - First instruction point
   - Second instruction point
   - Third instruction point

2. Section Two Title:
   - Another instruction point
   - More specific guidance
   - What you want Claude to look for

3. Section Three Title:
   - Be specific about what to extract
   - How to format numbers
   - What patterns to identify

Format the response in JSON with the following structure:
{
    "section_one": {
        "field1": "number or text",
        "field2": "number or text",
        "field3": ["list", "of", "items"]
    },
    "section_two": {
        "metric1": "number",
        "metric2": "number",
        "description": "text explanation"
    },
    "section_three": {
        "score": "number 0-100",
        "findings": ["list", "of", "findings"],
        "details": "text explanation"
    }
}
